= *iRINGTools* 1.2.0 Beta 2 =

A beta release of iRINGTools 1.2 that includes NHibernate and Multi-Project/Application support in the Adapter and !SemWeb SPARQL endpoints for Interface and Sandbox.  The download is available [http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools-120beta2.zip here]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Documentation/iRINGTools_Installation_Guide_v1_2_0.Draft.pdf Installation Guide]

== New Features ==
  * Multi-Project/Application Support in the Adapter Service.
  * PullDTO feature in the Adapter Service.
  * NHibernate Datalayer to enable non-commercial Oracle support and above features.
  * !SemWeb SPARQL Endpoint for Interface Service.
  * !SemWeb SPARQL Endpoint for Sandbox Service.

== Known Bugs ==
  * TripleStore refresh is broken due to changes in Mapping.
  * RefDataEditor is readonly.
